alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Kerr; Real (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 7:44PM CDT until April 30 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL KERR...NORTHEASTERN EDWARDS AND NORTH CENTRAL REAL COUNTIES... At 744 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles north of Tuff, or 16 miles north of Leakey, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Kerr, northeastern Edwards and north central Real Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
